vendor_name: Holiday Inn Resort Maoshan Hot Spring
title: Jurong China Hot Springs Escape near Maoshan Mountain
description: Explore the enchanting lakes, mountains and caves of Jurong City, while enjoying all the modern luxuries of Holiday Inn Resort Maoshan Hot-Spring, an IHG Hotel. Immerse yourself in the natural wonders that surround the city, visit spectacular temples and culturally significant sites, and float in the hotel's tranquil hot spring pool to feel completely rejuvenated. Treat your tastebuds to an exciting meal at the two onsite restaurants and enjoy an evening cocktail at Tambac Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Maoshan Hot-Spring, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No 88 Jumao Avenue, Jurong, Jiangsu, 212446, China
